steps.title: Notation
steps.text: Face turns use letters: R L U D F B. Add ' for counter-clockwise and 2 for double turns.

steps.title: Grip
steps.text: Keep the cube steady and turn with your index finger for U moves.

steps.title: Reset
steps.text: Use Z to reset the cube at any time.

steps.title: Make a Cross
steps.text: Match edge pieces to the center to form a cross on one face.
steps.moves: F R U R' U' F'

steps.title: Align Edges
steps.text: Rotate the top layer to match side centers before inserting.

steps.title: Pairing
steps.text: Pair a corner with its edge in the top layer.

steps.title: Insert Pair
steps.text: Insert the pair into the slot to complete both layers.
